125.content: What are the other choices
125.title: A few more

info.description:
You stumble across a costume shop buy a costume take it home but once you put it on one of the following happens depending on the costume

1) Accessories ears, tail etc will become real

2) A gender based costume will swap your gender & fall asleep in it everyone will forget your precious gender

3) A animal costume will turn you into that animal, be warned you won’t know what gender it is until you change


SEX is aloud but as long as it’s not porno level
